Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells typically operate at temperatures near 800 degrees C. One obstacle to reducing this temperature is finding a high-performance cathode for lower temperatures.
Titulo: Structure, electrical conductivity and electrochemical behavior of (La1-xSrx)2(Ni0.9Mn0.1)O4+δ based compounds

Sentencas: La2NiO4+delta (LNO) has shown promise as a good material as a cathode being a well-known mixed electronic and ionic conductor.
Titulo: Structure, electrical conductivity and electrochemical behavior of (La1-xSrx)2(Ni0.9Mn0.1)O4+δ based compounds

Sentencas: However, increasing the surface exchange in LNO is important for high performance applications.
Titulo: Structure, electrical conductivity and electrochemical behavior of (La1-xSrx)2(Ni0.9Mn0.1)O4+δ based compounds

Sentencas: Mn substitution has been shown to increase the surface exchange of LNO with Sr required to stabilize the structure.
Titulo: Structure, electrical conductivity and electrochemical behavior of (La1-xSrx)2(Ni0.9Mn0.1)O4+δ based compounds

Sentencas: Changing the ratio of Mn:Sr will change the oxidation state of Mn and Ni and the fundamental properties of the material.
Titulo: Structure, electrical conductivity and electrochemical behavior of (La1-xSrx)2(Ni0.9Mn0.1)O4+δ based compounds

Sentencas: Changing the Sr content in (La1-xSrx)(2)(Ni0.9Mn0.1)O(4+delta)was investigated with x = 0.1-0.5.
Titulo: Structure, electrical conductivity and electrochemical behavior of (La1-xSrx)2(Ni0.9Mn0.1)O4+δ based compounds

Sentencas: The XRD patterns shows a single phase K2NiF4 structures.
Titulo: Structure, electrical conductivity and electrochemical behavior of (La1-xSrx)2(Ni0.9Mn0.1)O4+δ based compounds

Sentencas: Above 35% Sr the 'a' parameter of the unit cell starts increasing and the 'c' parameter starts to decrease.
Titulo: Structure, electrical conductivity and electrochemical behavior of (La1-xSrx)2(Ni0.9Mn0.1)O4+δ based compounds

Sentencas: Increasing Sr content showed increased electrical conductivity from 40 S cm(-1) to 261 S cm(-1).
Titulo: Structure, electrical conductivity and electrochemical behavior of (La1-xSrx)2(Ni0.9Mn0.1)O4+δ based compounds

Sentencas: Impedance data of the 10% Sr sample showed behavior similar to LNO sample with slightly increased area specific resistance (ASR); any further increase in Sr content further increases ASR of the electrode.
Titulo: Structure, electrical conductivity and electrochemical behavior of (La1-xSrx)2(Ni0.9Mn0.1)O4+δ based compounds
